DOC.criteria: Coronary artery disease least 1 de novo lesion great 50 % stenosis coronary angiography Acute ST elevation MI Left main disease Contraindications aspirin , clopidogrel celecoxib Severe congestive heart failure Expected survival < 2 year Hepatic dysfunction Currently take NSAIDs COX2 inhibitor Renal dysfunction Use warfarin
